title: Sophos Cloud Optix
descriptionMarkdown: Use this template if you have a REST API connection to push data into Azure Sentinel Log Analytics.

The [Sophos Cloud Optix](https://www.sophos.com/en-us/products/cloud-optix.aspx) connector allows you to easily connect your Sophos Cloud Optix logs with Azure Sentinel, to view dashboards, create custom alerts, and improve investigation. This gives you more insight into your organization's cloud security and compliance posture and improves your cloud security operation capabilities.

sampleQueries.description: Top 10 Optix alerts raised for your cloud environment(s)
sampleQueries.query:
SophosCloudOptix_CL
 | summarize count() by alertDescription_s
 | top 10 by count_

sampleQueries.description: Top 5 environments with High severity Optix alerts raised
sampleQueries.query:
SophosCloudOptix_CL
 | where severity_s == 'HIGH'
 | summarize count() by accountId_s
 | top 2 by count_

dataTypes.name: SophosCloudOptix_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
SophosCloudOptix_CL
 | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
 | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
SophosCloudOptix_CL
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
 | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)
